name: Blackjack Professional
description:
Blackjack is a card game where you face off against the dealer. You're both trying to get to 21 points without going over. Whoever gets closest, wins. It's that simple.


Features:
• Different themed rooms available to play in.
• Online leader boards so you can see exactly where you stand, per month and per week.
• Customizable cards and chips!
• Daily prizes where you can win big!
